Hi there all (esp. Alex),

I was at the Changing the Game conference (I'm Tom - the guy that presented on the 'making a game/story' resource) and since IO have set this competition I've decided to have a stab at using Quest 5 to make an 'escape from the (four) room(s)' game using KS3 science knowledge. 

So far I think this is a really great tool and the hard work that you've done on it shows. Of course there's a learning curve associated with any tool, but I'm gradually getting there with bringing my puzzle ideas to life!

I'll let you know what I come up with!

Cheers,

Tom
